description: Step forward right foot, left hand block, right hand punch
Step forward right foot, left punch; twist hips, left block and right hand knife hand strike
Step forward right foot, left punch; cross hands, left hand backfist
Lift right leg, right hand palm block across; cross hands, right hand back fist to nose
Lift right leg, right hand palm block across; right step with right elbow strike, twist left elbow strike; step away, check for “bad guys”
Lift right leg, right hand palm block down; cross hands, right step, right hand back fist strike
Lift right leg, right hand palm block down; cross hands, right step, right hand knife hand strike
Step left, block left with open hand (front stance); twist hips for right hand reverse punch
Step left, double open hand block (back stance); left step for right hand reverse punch, twist hips for left hand reverse punch, twist hips for right hand reverse punch
Step forward with left foot (front stance), high block; maintain block, right hand punch to face; re-chamber to guard position, punch to low abdomen
R. Inside. Step right, check left, punch, punch, left foot moves, right roundhouse kick
R. Outside. Step left, check right, punch, punch, right foot moves, left roundhouse kick
R. Inside. Step right, right outside inside block, punch, punch, left foot moves, right side kick
R. Outside. Step left, left outside inside block ,punch, punch, right foot moves, left side kick

R. Outside. Left front kick, left outside inside block, punch, knock hand down, right short kick
R. Inside. Right outside inside kick, side kick, left punch, hook neck, left knee, right elbow (neck)
L. Inside. Left outside inside kick, side kick, right punch, hook neck, right knee, left elbow (neck)

L. Inside. Left front kick, left back kick, left open hand check, right punch, knock hand down, left palm strike
R. Inside. Left front kick, right roundhouse kick, left spinning short kick, left lunge punch
L. Inside. Right front kick, left roundhouse kick, right spinning short kick, right lunge punch

L. Outside. Left open hand check, grab, left roundhouse kick, short kick, grab right shoulder, right soccer sweep, drop to knee, punch to face
